context: I own this and love it, but is there a carrying case that will fit this snugly all together?
response: Yes! AmazonBasics case, have it myself and it fits perfect. Even room for the some extras, like headphones, a cleaning cloth and some games or SD cards. context: Do you need to buy planes? If so, how much do they cost? Thanks!
response: Yes you do. See Rise Of Flight .com, look under the store tab for pricing.

context: i have winwdows 8.. it is not being recognized.. i can see it devices and printers section on control panel. it is not letting me use it.. help please
response: You might have to download the Microsoft drivers that are required to use a basic wired controller. Considering at the base level, it's just a controller. If you google "Microsoft driver 360 wired" you should get it. It's a small download that'll let you use any wired 360 controller.

context: Will this game work on a windows 7 home premium?
response: Yes that's what I ran it on. You may have to run it in Windows XP Compatability mode which is easy to do.
